sourcesContent:
import { data } from "../Data/TodoListData" import "./Task.css"; import Form from "./Form"; function Task() { return ( <> {data.map(task => (

Title: {task.description.title}

Description: {task.description.content}

Completed

Due:

{task.date.hour}:{task.date.minute} - {task.date.day}/{task.date.month}/{task.date.year}

Thời gian đã thực hiện: {task.process.actual_duration}h

))} ) } export default Task;
